message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to offer $850000 for the product. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $920000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $920000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to offer $875000. This is a fair price considering our previous discussions, and it would help us close this deal quickly.

I understand that $875000 is a fair price for you, Bob, but I'm still not getting the value I was hoping for. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $950000. I think this is a reasonable price considering the product's value to you.

Alice, I understand your need to get a good price, but $950000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway on our last two offers and offer $885000.  I'm confident this is a fair price considering our previous discussions. Let's close this deal and avoid going to another seller.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $885000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $915000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Alice, I appreciate your commitment to negotiating, but $915000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $900000 for the product. It's a good compromise, and it would allow us to close this deal quickly.  I'm confident this is the best we can do to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $920000. I've already made significant concessions, and I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one, but I need to get at least $910000. I'm counteroffering at $910000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
